headline: MarketAxess (MKTX): Evaluating Valuation After New Growth Initiatives and Automation Plans Unveiled
summary: Recent remarks from MarketAxess Holdings (MKTX) at the Barclays Financial Services Conference put a spotlight on its next phase of growth, including deeper automation, non U.S. credit expansion and emerging markets opportunities. See our latest analysis for MarketAxess Holdings. Even with these growth levers, the 1 year total shareholder return of negative 29.18 percent and 3 year total shareholder return of negative 38.11 percent show longer term momentum has faded, despite a modest recent...
